refnamediv.refpurpose: Delete a record from a file

para.programlisting:
#include <opensc.h>
int sc_delete_record(struct sc_card *card, unsigned int rec_nr);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function deletes a record specified by rec_nr on card. This is not a standard ISO 7816 operation, and is currently only supported on the Oberthur smart cards.

refsect1.title: Return value
refsect1.para: Returns 0 if successful, or a negative value in case of error.
